title: v.245 Hotfixes - October 19, 2023
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.245 - Midnight Carnival - Nautilus update.

title: Investigation on NA Reboot Server Issues - October 19, 2023
content: We are currently investigating the issues with logging into NA Reboot world.

title: [Completed] Scheduled NA Maintenance - October 19, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 7 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: October 2023 Community Contests and Events
content: Take a look at the new and upcoming Community Contests below, and be prepared to test your imagination!

title: [Updated] Issue with Pumpkin Pets in Reboot Worlds
content: We will be removing the pet buffs from the Pumpkin pets that were rewarded in the Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry for Reboot worlds.

title: Cash Shop Update for October 18
content: Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, Meow Candy Packages, One-Eyed Grim Reaper Package, Halloween Permanent Effects, and more!
